sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' const PopupCard = ({ visible, setVisible, country }) => { console.log(country) let RenderedCurrency let RenderdLanguages if (country[0] !== 'undefined') { RenderedCurrency = country.currencies.map((currency) => { console.log(currency.name) return
{currency.name}
}) RenderdLanguages = country.languages.map((language, index) => { return index === 0 ? (
{`${language.name}`}
) : (
{`, ${language.name}`}
) }) } return (

More About the Country

{country.name}

Native Name:

{country.nativeName}

Population:

{country.population}

Region:

{country.region}

Sub Region:

{country.subregion}

Capital:

{country.capital}

Top Level Domain:

{country.topLevelDomain}

Currencies:

{RenderedCurrency}

Languges:

{RenderdLanguages}

) } export default PopupCard
